mapper.update: update student set stuUsername = #{stuusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stuPassword = #{stupassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stuName = #{stuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stuSex = #{stusex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stuClass = #{stuclass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stuRoom = #{sturoom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stuBuilding = #{stubuilding,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stuStatus = #{stustatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where stuId = #{stuid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select stuId, stuUsername, stuPassword, stuName, stuSex, stuClass, stuRoom, stuBuilding, stuStatus from student where stuId = #{stuid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select stuId, stuUsername, stuPassword, stuName, stuSex, stuClass, stuRoom, stuBuilding, stuStatus from student
select * from student where stuUsername=#{username} and stuPassword=#{password}
